product_name: Deuter OnTop ABS 28 SL Avalanche Airbag Pack - Women's
long_description: Ideal for half-day backcountry tours and full-day epics, the OnTop ABS 20 Avalanche Airbag Pack for women unites safety and comfort with the ABS airbag system and Deuter Alpine Back System.
